subject: Hello My Dear,
body:
Hello My Dear,
 I know that this message will be a surprise to you. I was just
 searching through the Google Internet search when I found your email
 address having prayed over it. I am sending this message to you
 praying that it will reach you in good health. My Name is Mrs. Anita
 Morgan from Iondon,.I am married to Mr. Frank Morgan, A Contractor and
 gold merchant who owned a small gold Mine in Burkina Faso; He died of
 Pulmonary disease in August 2017, and our long years of marriage were
 not blessed with children. During his lifetime he deposited the sum of
 8 Million dollars in
 Societe Generale Bank .The
 deposited money was from the sale of the shares, death benefits
 payment and entitlements of my deceased husband by his company.
 I am suffering from long time cancer and presently i am partially
 suffering from a stroke illness which has become almost impossible for
 me to move around, from all medical indications my condition has
 really deteriorated and itâ€™s pretty obvious that i may not live long,
 owning to the rapid growth by stage and the excruciating pain that
 accrues to it. I was diagnosed and my Doctor told me privately what I
 should expect, building my spirit for the inevitable. 
She says i may
 not last for more than six months
, based on this i sincerely request
 for your assistance in this humanitarian work.
 I have decided to donate what I inherited from my late husband to you
 for good work of God for helping Motherless babies/Less
 privileged/Widows, because I am dying and diagnosed with cancer 4
 years ago. If this money remains unclaimed after my death, the bank
 executives or the government will take the money as unclaimed funds
 and maybe use it for selfish and worthless ventures. I need a very
 honest person who can claim this money and use it for Charity and
 humanitarian works, that will be named after my late husband and my
 name. I need your positive answer to know if you will be able to
 execute this project, and I will give you more information on how the
 fund will be transferred to your bank account. I now realize that
 wealth without life in Christ is vanity and non-sense.
 Best Regards,
 Mrs. Anita Morgan

subject: Re: Hello My Dear,
body:
Hello Mrs. Anita Morgan,

I'm truly sorry to hear about your health condition and the unfortunate passing of your husband. It's admirable that you're thinking about helping others even in such difficult times.

Your story is quite touching, and I'm interested in learning more about this project you mentioned. Could you please provide more details? How can I assist in this noble cause without compromising my personal information?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Susan

subject: Re: Hello My Dear,
body:
Open attachment to see my passport and send me your passport before we can
start the process of the transfer of the fund to your country Bank account

subject: Re: Hello My Dear,
body:
Oh, I'm sorry but I can't open any attachments at the moment. My computer has been acting up lately. But I'm really interested in this process you're talking about! Could you tell me more about it? How does it work exactly?

Best wishes,
Susan

subject: Re: Hello My Dear,
body:
It works it takes transfer charge fee $2100 to your country Bank account
because the bank can't deduct from customer fund okay

subject: Re: Hello My Dear,
body:
Hello there! 

Thank you for explaining that to me. I'm not very familiar with these kinds of transactions, so your help is much appreciated. So, if I understand correctly, the transfer charge fee is something that my bank will handle on their end? And this fee can't be deducted from the customer's fund, right? 

Could you please tell me more about how this process works? For example, how long does it usually take for the transfer to complete? And are there any additional fees or charges that I should be aware of?

I'm really interested in learning more about this. Thanks again for your help!

Best wishes,
Susan

subject: Re: Hello My Dear,
body: Thanks it takes three working day and no extra fee

subject: Re: Hello My Dear,
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your response. That sounds quite efficient! Could you please elaborate on what the process entails during these three working days? And it's great to hear that there are no extra fees, but could you clarify what costs are included in the initial fee? I'm just trying to understand everything clearly. Thanks again!

Best wishes,
Susan

subject: Re: Hello My Dear,
body: Send me your personal information and Id before we can proceed

subject: Re: Hello My Dear,
body:
Oh, I'm sorry but I can't provide my personal ID. But I'm really interested in what you're saying! Can you tell me more about it?

Best wishes,
Susan

subject: Re: Hello My Dear,
body:
open attachment to see my passport and send me your passport to see you
before we can start this transaction

subject: Re: Hello My Dear,
body:
Oh, I'm sorry but I can't open any attachments or send my passport. But I'm really interested in what you have to say! Can we continue our conversation without sharing personal documents?

Best wishes,
Susan

subject: Re: Hello My Dear,
body:
Hello there! I hope you're having a great day. I'm always eager to learn and share information. What would you like to discuss today?

Best wishes,
Susan
